empty.title: No requests found

helpers.readyBody: Fill sample type, scheduled delivery, and pick one parameter, then submit for admin review.
helpers.submittedBody: This request is submitted and waiting for admin review. Editing is disabled to prevent conflicting changes.
helpers.deliveryHint: Use a realistic time you can deliver the sample. This helps scheduling.

portalRequestForm.title: Create Sample Request
portalRequestForm.subtitle: Fill required fields → save as draft. Admin will review before processing.

helpers.scheduledDelivery: This is your planned drop-off time (not the lab receiving time).

dashboardPage.title: Dashboard
dashboardPage.subtitle: Welcome{{name}}. Create and track your sample requests here.

cards.nextBody: Create draft → complete required fields → submit → admin review → schedule delivery → physical receive.
cards.reviseBody: If admin returns your request, update it and submit again.

dashboardPage.flowHint: Draft → Submitted → Admin review → Delivery schedule → Physical receive.

recent.title: Recent requests
recent.subtitle: Jump back into what you worked on recently.
recent.emptyBody: Create your first request to start the workflow.

tips.title: Tips to avoid delays
tips.subtitle: Small habits that keep your request moving.

items.requiredFields: Fill the required fields (sample type, scheduled delivery, and parameter) before submitting.
items.revise: If your request is returned, open it, address the note, save draft, then submit again.
items.timezone: Use the scheduled delivery time to plan your drop-off. Times are shown in your local timezone.

errors.loadFailed: We couldn’t load your requests. Please try again.

errors.sampleIdChangeMissing: Sample ID change request not found.

auth.staffSignInSubtitle: Use your registered staff account to access the LIMS dashboard.
auth.clientSignInSubtitle: Use your client account to submit and track sample requests.
auth.staffSignUpSubtitle: Register as staff. Your account will be verified by Laboratory Head.
auth.clientSignUpSubtitle: Register as a client. Your account will be verified by admin.
auth.name: Name
auth.tipInstitutionFallback: Tip: you can leave this blank and we will use “Institution name”.
auth.staffApprovalNote: Account will be inactive until Laboratory Head approval.
auth.phoneIncomplete: Phone number is incomplete. Please enter at least 10 digits after +62.
auth.nikInvalid: National ID (NIK) must be exactly 16 digits.
auth.loginFailedFallback: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.registrationFailedFallback: Registration failed. Please review your data.
auth.clientRegSubmitted: Client registration submitted. Waiting for admin verification.
auth.staffRegSubmitted: Staff registration submitted. Waiting for Laboratory Head approval.
auth.welcomeBackPortal: Sign in to manage your sample requests and results.
auth.welcomeBackStaff: To keep your lab records consistent, sign in with your registered staff account.
auth.rightPanelPortalSubtitle: Create a client account and submit sample requests in a structured ISO-aligned workflow.
auth.rightPanelStaffSubtitle: Create a new user and begin your biomolecular workflow with ISO 17025–aligned records.

approvals.title: Staff approvals
approvals.subtitle: Review staff registrations. Approve to activate, or reject with a clear reason.

reject.reasonPlaceholder: Explain what needs to be corrected…

forbidden.title: 403 – Access denied
forbidden.bodyClients: Your role ({{role}}) is not allowed to access the Clients module.
forbidden.bodyApprovals: Your role ({{role}}) is not allowed to approve clients.

list.title: Client management
list.subtitle: View and maintain client records.
list.emptyFiltered: No clients match the current filters.

approvals.title: Client approvals
approvals.subtitle: Approve or reject newly registered client applications.

form.editHint: Fill in the data correctly for documentation and communication.

deleteModal.title: Delete client?
deleteModal.subtitle: This removes the client from the active list.
deleteModal.body: You are about to remove {{name}} from the active client registry.
deleteModal.softDeleteNote: This is a soft delete. Historical samples, reports, and audit logs linked to this client will remain stored to preserve ISO/IEC 17025 traceability.

decision.rejectReasonPlaceholder: Explain why this cover is rejected…
decision.rejectReasonHelp: Keep it specific so the next reviewer knows what to fix.
decision.approveDefaultHint: This will move the workflow to the next step.

inbox.title: Quality Cover Inbox
inbox.omSubtitle: OM — Submitted covers waiting for verification.
inbox.lhSubtitle: LH — Verified covers waiting for validation.

sections.supportingHint: Files uploaded by the analyst (if any).

hints.notInSubmitted: This cover is not in submitted status.
hints.notInVerified: This cover is not in verified status.
hints.approveHintOm: This will mark the cover as verified and send it to LH inbox for validation.
hints.approveHintLh: This is the final step. The cover will become validated. If tests exist, COA will be generated.

flash.verifiedOk: Quality cover verified. Sent to LH inbox for validation.
flash.validatedOk: Quality cover validated. COA generated and saved in Reports.
flash.validatedWarn: Quality cover validated, but COA generation is still blocked (check tests/results).

section.title: Quality cover
section.subtitle: Fill QC results and method of analysis. Submit to lock the record.
section.lockedHint: This record is locked (submitted). Editing is disabled.

supporting.title: Supporting documents
supporting.subtitle: Optional. Upload any files (0..n): PDF, images, DOCX, XLSX, etc.
supporting.filesHint: Files are uploaded when you click Save draft or Submit.

placeholders.methodOfAnalysis: e.g. RT-qPCR, WGS library prep + bioinformatics pipeline…

hints.methodOfAnalysis: Keep it specific so reviewers can reproduce the method.

errors.loadInboxFailed: Failed to load reagent approvals inbox.
errors.loadApprovalDetailFailed: Failed to load reagent approval detail.

approvals.title: Reagent approvals
approvals.subtitle: Review submitted reagent requests. Approve to proceed, or reject with a clear revision note.

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by LOO number / client name…
filters.enterTip: Tip: press Enter to apply search.

approvals.empty: No approvals found for the current filters.

detail.actionsOnlyWhenSubmitted: Actions are only available when status is submitted.
detail.onlySubmittedCanApprove: Only submitted requests can be approved.
detail.onlySubmittedCanReject: Only submitted requests can be rejected.
detail.flashApproved: Approved. Reagent Request document can be generated next.
detail.flashRejected: Rejected. The analyst needs to revise and resubmit.
detail.looWarnEndpoint: LOO detail is not available (endpoint mismatch). Sample list may not appear.
detail.looWarnFailed: LOO detail failed to load. Sample list may not appear.
detail.samplesNotFound: No sample list found for this LOO.

approval.rejectNotePlaceholder: Write a short, actionable reason for revision…
approval.rejectNoteHelp: Keep it specific: what to fix, and what to submit again.
approval.approveHint: Approve this request to allow document generation in the next step.

request.title: Reagent request
request.subtitle: Build request per LOO • LOO ID: {{id}}

errors.lockedEdit: Request is already {{status}}. You can’t edit or save draft.
errors.noRequestYet: No request yet. Save draft first.
errors.minContent: Add at least 1 item or 1 booking before submitting.

hints.onlyDraftCanSubmit: Only draft requests can be submitted.
hints.minContentToSubmit: Add at least 1 item or 1 booking.

crosscheck.title: Crosscheck gate not passed
crosscheck.body: Submit was blocked because one or more samples in this LOO haven’t passed crosscheck.

catalog.title: Catalog items (BHP/Reagent)
catalog.tip: All items are shown; search just helps you find faster. Click an item to add to the request.

equipment.title: Equipment
equipment.tip: Click equipment to add a booking to the request.

request.help: Click a catalog item / equipment to add it to the request. Use the Request (cart) button to edit qty, unit, notes, and booking time.

cart.title: Request cart
cart.lockedBanner: This request is locked. You can’t edit items or bookings.
cart.itemsSubtitle: Adjust qty, unit, and add notes if needed.
cart.equipmentSubtitle: Set the planned schedule for each equipment booking.
cart.emptyItemsBody: Add items from the catalog, then come back here to fine-tune.
cart.emptyBookingsBody: Add equipment from the list, then set schedule here.
cart.minSubmitHint: Add at least 1 item or 1 booking before submitting.
cart.tipsBody: Save Draft to keep changes. Submit when everything is ready. After submit, editing is locked.

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: All PDF documents (LOO, Reagent Request, COA, etc).

empty.title: No reports found

states.errorBody: Try again or download the PDF.

banner.assignedLock: Sample ID assigned: {{code}}. Workflow actions are now locked.
banner.sampleIdPendingVerification: Sample ID change is pending OM/LH verification.
banner.sampleIdApproved: Sample ID change approved. Admin can assign again.
banner.sampleIdRejected: Sample ID change rejected. Admin can propose again.

actions.title: Next actions
actions.subtitle: Buttons appear only when your step is needed.
actions.hiddenBody: Sample ID has been assigned. Workflow actions are hidden.
actions.none: No actions required for your role right now.

adminAccept.title: Accept request
adminAccept.subtitle: Confirm details and continue to the physical workflow.

adminReturn.title: Return request to client
adminReturn.subtitle: Requires a note. Client will revise and resubmit.

adminReceivedFromClient.title: Mark as received from client
adminReceivedFromClient.subtitle: Record arrival time at the admin desk.

adminBringToCollector.title: Hand off to Sample Collector
adminBringToCollector.subtitle: Moves status to in-transit to Sample Collector.

openIntakeChecklist.title: Open intake checklist
openIntakeChecklist.subtitle: Complete checks. If failed, return to admin.

adminReceivedFromCollector.title: Mark as received from collector
adminReceivedFromCollector.subtitle: Record return time from Sample Collector.

clientPickedUp.title: Mark as picked up by client
clientPickedUp.subtitle: Final step for returned samples.

verifyIntake.title: Verify intake
verifyIntake.subtitle: Verify intake result from Sample Collector.

verifySampleIdChange.title: Review sample ID change
verifySampleIdChange.subtitle: Approve or reject the requested sample ID change.

history.title: Workflow history
history.subtitle: Only shows events that actually happened.

timeline.adminHandoffToCollector: Admin handed sample to Sample Collector

timeline.adminReceivedBackFromCollector: Admin received sample back from Sample Collector

addColumn.title: Add column {{position}} {{reference}}

tooltips.synced: Board data comes from the server.

errors.finishFailed: Failed to finish the last stage.
errors.forbiddenBodyRole: Your role ({{role}}) is not allowed to access this page.

subtitle.return: Send this request back to the client for revision. A note is required.
subtitle.approve: Approve this request and move it to the next step.
subtitle.received: Confirm the sample has been physically received by the lab (admin desk).

note.placeholderReturn: Explain what needs to be revised (required)…
note.helpReturn: A note is required so the client knows what to fix.

hints.format: Format: PREFIX 001 (max 5 letters, space, number). Number will be padded to 3 digits.

errors.format: Format must be: PREFIX 001 (uppercase letters, max 5-letter prefix, space, number).

workflow.crosscheckSubtitle: Match lab code with the physical label.
workflow.mismatchUseFail: Mismatch. Use Fail and add a reason.
workflow.codesMismatchHint: Codes do not match. Use Fail and provide a reason.
workflow.enterBothCodesHint: Enter the physical label code to compare.

archive.subtitle: Historical records that are read-only (useful for traceability and audits).

archive.emptyHint: Nothing matches your search. Try a shorter keyword.

archiveDetail.overviewHint: Key metadata for traceability (client, workflow group, final status, and generated docs).
archiveDetail.docsHint: Documents linked to this sample (repository + fallback sources).
archiveDetail.docsEmptyHint: This sample does not have stored PDFs yet (or access is restricted).
archiveDetail.timelineHint: A chronological trail of workflow events.

filters.searchPlaceholder: Search by lab code, client, sample type, status…

reagent.blockedTitle: Blocked until all samples pass crosscheck.

help.title: How this list works
help.body: Samples are grouped by LOO. Reagent request is available only when all samples in an LOO pass crosscheck.
help.hint: Tip: use search and filters to narrow results.

logs.subtitle: A read-only trail of important actions for traceability and accountability.
logs.forbiddenBody: Your current role ({{role}}) doesn’t have access to audit logs.

filters.title: Filters
filters.hint: Tip: use an ID to narrow results quickly.

table.title: Activity
table.empty: No audit logs found for the current filters.

notFound.title: 404 – Page not found
notFound.message: The page you are looking for does not exist.

templates.title: Document templates
templates.subtitle: Manage DOCX templates: upload new versions, set record/form prefixes, and keep revision numbers consistent.
templates.searchPlaceholder: Search by doc code, title, or kind…
templates.emptyBody: Try clearing filters or refresh to fetch the latest list.

upload.title: Upload DOCX template
upload.hint: Upload a .docx file. After upload, the system creates a new version (vN).
upload.dropzoneTitle: Drag & drop a .docx file or click to browse

edit.title: Edit template metadata
edit.footerTip: Tip: if your form prefix already includes RevXX, keep it consistent with revision_no.

errors.invalidFileType: Unsupported file type. Please upload a .{{ext}} template.

generator.title: LOO Workspace
generator.subtitle: Pick eligible samples, collect approvals, then generate the Letter of Order (LOO).
generator.searchPlaceholder: Search by sample code / client / sample type…
generator.guidance: Tip: Choose the parameters first, then approvals. Only “Ready” samples can be generated.
generator.emptyBody: Try adjusting your search or status filter, then refresh.

approval.readyHint: This sample is ready to generate.

params.title: Parameters
params.notReadyNote: You can choose parameters now, but generating is only possible after OM & LH approvals.

generator.footerHint: Generate uses only selected samples that are marked as Ready.

disabled.noneReadyInList: No ready samples in the list.
disabled.pickReady: Select at least one ready sample.

errors.noneReadySelected: None of the selected samples are ready.
errors.paramRequiredForSample: Select at least one parameter for sample #{{id}}.

result.title: LOO generated
result.downloadHint: Use the preview window to download/print the PDF.

intakeChecklist.title: Intake checklist
intakeChecklist.subtitle: All items must pass. If any item fails, the request will be returned to admin.

warning.anyFail: One or more items failed. Request status will become {{status}} and be returned to admin.

validation.fixHighlighted: Please complete the highlighted items before submitting.

cap_sealed.label: Cap/closure sealed tightly
cap_sealed.hint: Container is properly closed and securely sealed.

no_leakage.label: No leakage/spillage
no_leakage.hint: No leakage, spillage, or contamination observed.

label_attached.label: Label attached
label_attached.hint: A label is present on the container.

label_clear.label: Label clear & readable
label_clear.hint: Label text is legible (not faded, smudged, or unclear).

label_matches_form.label: Label matches request/form
label_matches_form.hint: Label details match the request form (name/ID/date/time where applicable).

identity_complete.label: Identity information complete
identity_complete.hint: Identity information is complete according to lab requirement.

sample_type_matches.label: Sample type matches request
sample_type_matches.hint: Sample type/container matches what was requested.

volume_sufficient.label: Volume sufficient
volume_sufficient.hint: Volume/amount is sufficient for the requested tests.

vtm_present.label: VTM/transport media present (if required)
vtm_present.hint: Transport media (e.g., VTM) is present when required by SOP.

packaging_intact.label: Packaging intact & safe
packaging_intact.hint: Secondary packaging is intact and protects sample integrity.

triple_packaging.label: Triple packaging applied (if required)
triple_packaging.hint: Triple packaging is applied when required by SOP.

temperature_condition_ok.label: Temperature/transport condition OK
temperature_condition_ok.hint: Cooling/temperature control (ice pack/dry ice) meets storage requirements.

request_form_attached.label: Request form attached
request_form_attached.hint: Sample request form / sample list is attached and complete.

chain_of_custody_attached.label: Chain of custody attached (if used)
chain_of_custody_attached.hint: Chain-of-custody form is attached if applicable.

other_docs_complete.label: Other supporting docs complete
other_docs_complete.hint: Any other required supporting documents are complete (if applicable).
